Friday Night Funkin

Music Rhythm Battle

4.8 Rating
1M+ Players
50+ Songs

Friday Night Funkin Unblocked

Friday Night Funkin Unblocked is a wildly popular casual arcade music game where you can immerse yourself in the crazy beats and supercharged duels. Tap the arrows in sync with the beats to nail every note and stay on rhythm! Face off against all kinds of funky foes. The pace is getting faster and the challenges more exciting! Super original beats and music tracks, let you get addicted to FNFs unique sound tour world!
